abstract: A Disney executive points to many potential areas of dramatic growth in the company, but says the movie division is not one of them.
snippet: A Disney executive points to many potential areas of dramatic growth in the company, but says the movie division is not one of them.
lead_paragraph: Where does Disney see its growth coming from in the next three-to-seven years? Apparently, everywhere but movies.

headline.main: Disney Exec Cites Expected Areas of Growth – But Not the Movies
